channel.title: CVE Feed for wpdatatables -- wpDataTables – WordPress Data Table, Dynamic Tables & Table Charts Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wpdatatables -- wpDataTables – WordPress Data Table, Dynamic Tables & Table Charts Plugin

item.title: CVE-2024-4895|2024-05-23T02:33:06.431Z -- wpdatatables -- wpDataTables – WordPress Data Table, Dynamic Tables & Table Charts Plugin
item.description: The wpDataTables – WordPress Data Table, Dynamic Tables & Table Charts Plugin plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the CSV import functionality in all versions up to, and including, 3.4.2.12 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
